title: Good App
comment: Love this app - very useful.  I have it on my lock screen.  Now I just have to tap my phone twice and swipe down to see all my important info at a glance.    I do have some suggestions/improvements.    1.  Needs more time customisation.  I like to use am/pm in 12 hour mode. 2.  Needs more date formats too.  (eg 31/12/2014)  (Here in Oz (Australia) we put the day first). 3.  Instead of swiping left or right to see/select formats what about showing a list instead.  Then you can see many formats at once and just tick the one you want instead of swiping through all of them. 4.  Need to be able to reorder extensions without the need to remove them and then add them back in the right order.

Using HTC One (M7) on Android 4.4.2 Sense 6 and can use it fine, I love it. But I can't get it to be on my default lockscreen which is a great drawback and the sole reason why I have this widget. Any fix to that would be great

title: How to enable (gs4)
comment: See some questions about this, so I'll try to help you guys out... title: Best widget for Samsung users
comment: Best free widget within the app store and goes along with C Locker Pro (locker app) perfectly! So if any of you ever wanted to use DashClock on their lock screen, but got annoyed by Samsung's default missed call/sms pop-up window, which was always overriding DashClock, then i suggest you to get C Locker Pro a chance. It's the only locker on the app store which solved that problem on my S3, without having to root my phone and losing its warranty by using custom roms. I'm very glad i found it. ClP also also shows DashClock in its extended view (no swipe down needed anymore to reveal all of DashClock's content), and as of the latest update (v4.4.1) DashClock can cover up to 80% of the lock screen, which is enough for the every day user! It also offers additional features, but those 2 are probably the most important ones for Samsung owners:) So if you ever wanted to use Dashclock with all of it's features on your lock screen, then i strongly suggest you to get C Locker Pro as well - currently on a 30% sale and worth every penny of it. The developer is constantly improving the app, and it's getting better with each new update. Try it out - you won't regret it.

title: Great app!
comment: Extremely useful!!!  This app brings lots of great information to the lock screen and it has APIs so that any developer can display information from any compatible app.  This is GENIUS.  I have a couple of suggestions:  1) An in-app "store" where you could display all of the various compatible apps in categories.  This provides enormous value as you'd have a space dedicated to touting how useful dashclock is AND it would make finding extensions easier  2) MORE CUSTOMIZATION.  Keep the solid color.. but PLEASE add more options for different colors and opacity levels.  Just throw in a color picker with a transparency slider and I'm happy!!  Otherwise.. this is an absolutely AMAZING piece of software.  It's not an app... it's a platform!!!
